1. figure of a person; figures of people 船上の人々はその島に５人の人影を見てびっくりしました。The men on board were surprised to see five men on the island.

sentences.translation: The men on board were surprised to see five men on the island.

meanings.meaning: 1. face; looks; countenance 母の面影を忘れられない。The image of my mother is on my mind.
2. vestige; trace; reminder この町はいまだに昔の面影をとどめている。This town still retains something of the old days.
俤 【おもかげ】
俤: Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: The image of my mother is on my mind.
This town still retains something of the old days.

meanings.meaning: 1. bad influence; negative influence
1. shadow; shade; shading; gloom 陰影に気をつけてみたのですがなかなかうまくいかないです。I tried to take care with the shadows, but it just doesn't go very well.
2. nuance; shades of meaning; subtleties
陰翳 【いんえい】

sentences.translation: I tried to take care with the shadows, but it just doesn't go very well.
